pages.text: It seems I will need to be adroit with vectors if I am to get anywhere in my studies. I have compiled some resources here on vectors if I find I do not know how to work with them.$(br2)First off, an enlightening video on the topic.

Additionally, it seems that the mages who manipulated $(thing)Psi energy/$ (the so-called "spellslingers"), despite their poor naming sense, had some quite-effective lessons on vectors to teach their acolytes. I've taken the liberty of linking to one of their texts on the next page.$(br2)They seem to have used different language for their spellcasting:$(li)A "Spell Piece" was their name for an action;$(li)a "Trick" was their name for a spell; and$(li)an "Operator" was their name for a non-spell action.
